org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding

类 RowIndexCodecV1

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding.AbstractDataBlockEncoder
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.encoding.RowIndexCodecV1
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DataBlockEncoder

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class RowIndexCodecV1
extends AbstractDataBlockEncoder
    Store cells following every row's start offset, so we can binary search to a row's cells. Format: flat cells integer: number of rows integer: row0's offset integer: row1's offset .... integer: dataSize

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • startBlockEncoding

        public void startBlockEncoding(HFileBlockEncodingContext blkEncodingCtx,
                               DataOutputStream out)
                        throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataBlockEncoder
        Starts encoding for a block of KeyValues. Call DataBlockEncoder.endBlockEncoding(HFileBlockEncodingContext, DataOutputStream, byte[]) to finish encoding of a block.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • encode

        public int encode(Cell cell,
                  HFileBlockEncodingContext encodingCtx,
                  DataOutputStream out)
           throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataBlockEncoder
        Encodes a KeyValue.
        返回:
        unencoded kv size written
        抛出:
        IOException

      • endBlockEncoding

        public void endBlockEncoding(HFileBlockEncodingContext encodingCtx,
                             DataOutputStream out,
                             byte[] uncompressedBytesWithHeader)
                      throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataBlockEncoder
        Ends encoding for a block of KeyValues. Gives a chance for the encoder to do the finishing stuff for the encoded block. It must be called at the end of block encoding.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • decodeKeyValues

        public ByteBuffer decodeKeyValues(DataInputStream source,
                                  HFileBlockDecodingContext decodingCtx)
                           throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: DataBlockEncoder
        Decode.
        参数:
        source - Compressed stream of KeyValues.
        返回:
        Uncompressed block of KeyValues.
        抛出:
        IOException - If there is an error in source.

      • getFirstKeyCellInBlock

        public Cell getFirstKeyCellInBlock(ByteBuff block)
        从接口复制的说明: DataBlockEncoder
        Return first key in block as a cell. Useful for indexing. Typically does not make a deep copy but returns a buffer wrapping a segment of the actual block's byte array. This is because the first key in block is usually stored unencoded.
        参数:
        block - encoded block we want index, the position will not change
        返回:
        First key in block as a cell.

      • createSeeker

        public DataBlockEncoder.EncodedSeeker createSeeker(CellComparator comparator,
                                                   HFileBlockDecodingContext decodingCtx)
        从接口复制的说明: DataBlockEncoder
        Create a HFileBlock seeker which find KeyValues within a block.
        参数:
        comparator - what kind of comparison should be used
        返回:
        A newly created seeker.
